cards.name: Galacta
cards.ability: Each turn, the first card you play at another location reveals with +3 Power.

cards.name: Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

cards.name: Iron Patriot
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a random 4, 5, or 6-Cost card to your hand. If you’re winning here after next turn, give it -3 Cost.

cards.name: Pixie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Shuffle the base Costs of all cards in your deck that started there.

cards.name: Sauron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your hand and deck.

items.title: Collector's Vault
items: Exclusive variants available again for a limited time!

items.title: High Voltage
items: 2,000 Volts - The First Ghost Rider Avatar
3,500 Volts - Neon Nights Border
10,000 Volts - Ironheart Marco Failla Variant
12,000 Volts - The First Ghost Rider Card

items.name: Yondu
changes: 1/2 - On Reveal: Destroy the card that costs the least in your opponent’s deck.
1/2 - On Reveal: Banish the card that costs the least in your opponent’s deck.

items.name: Gorgon
changes: 2/3 - Ongoing: Your opponent’s cards that didn’t start in their deck cost 1 more. (maximum 6)
2/3 - Ongoing: Your opponent’s created cards cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

items.name: King Eitri
changes: 1/2 - Activate: Draw a card from your deck that didn’t start there.
1/2 - Activate: Draw a created card from your deck.

items.name: Quinjet
changes: 1/2 - Ongoing: Cards that didn’t start in your deck cost 1 less. (minimum 1)
1/2 - Ongoing: Your created cards cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

items.name: Mockingbird
changes: 6/9 - Costs 1 less for each of your cards in play that didn’t start in your deck.
6/9 - Costs 1 less for each of your created cards in play.

items.name: Hotel Inferno
changes: After you play a card here this turn, destroy the top card of your opponent’s deck.
After you play a card here this turn, banish the top card of your opponent’s deck.

items.name: The Sandbar
changes: Cards that didn’t start in your deck cost 1 more. (max 6)
Created cards cost 1 more. (max 6)

items.name: Panoptichron
changes: Cards that didn't start in your deck get +2 Power here.
Created cards here have +2 Power.

items.name: Hela
changes: 6/9 - On Reveal: For each different Cost among them, resurrect a card you discarded to a random location.

items.name: Sword Master
changes: 3/7 - On Reveal: Discard an odd-costed card from your hand.

items.name: Hellcow
changes: 4/7 - Activate: Discard a card from your hand.

items.name: Black Cat
changes: 4/10 - End of Turn: Discard this from your hand.

items.name: DoomBot 2099
changes: 4/1 - Ongoing: Your other DoomBots and Doom have +1 Power.

items.name: Cap's Shield
changes: 1/1 - Ongoing: This can’t be destroyed. Give your Cap +2 Power when this moves to Cap’s location.

items.name: Loki
changes: 2/2 - On Reveal: Replace your deck with your opponent’s starting deck. Give those cards -1 Cost.

items.name: Thanos
changes: 6/10 - Game Start: Draw Thanos and shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

items.name: Space Stone
changes: 1/1 - On Reveal: Draw a card. Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing or moving Thanos.

items.name: Wolverine
changes: 2/2 - When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it with +2 Power at a random location.

items.name: Bruce Banner
changes: 2/1 - End of Turn: If you have unspent Energy, 25% chance to HULK OUT!
2/1 -> End of Turn: If you have unspent Energy, 33% chance to HULK OUT!

items.name: Deep Space
changes: On Reveal abilities won't happen at this location.
Temporarily removed due to Iron Patriot bug

items.name: Iron Patriot
changes: 2/3 - On Reveal: Add a random 4, 5, or 6-Cost card to your hand. If you’re winning here after next turn, give it -4 Cost.
2/3 - On Reveal: Add a random 4, 5, or 6-Cost card to your hand. If you’re winning here after next turn, give it -3 Cost.

items.name: Galacta
changes: 4/6 - Each turn, the first card you play at another location reveals with +3 Power.

items.name: Pixie
changes: 2/1 - On Reveal: Shuffle the base Costs of all cards in your deck that started there.

items.name: Sauron
changes: 3/4 - On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your hand and deck.

items.name: Ghost Rider
changes: 4/4 - On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.
